name: youversion-suggest-raycast
title: YouVersion Suggest
description: A Raycast extension for searching the YouVersion Bible quickly and easily
author: caleb531

commands.name: filter
commands.title: Filter Bible Reference
commands.subtitle: Type the name of a chapter, verse, or range of verses
commands.description: Allows you to quickly jump to a particular Bible chapter, verse, or range of verses just by typing the name of that Bible reference
